医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
革命性的血液测试可监测大脑中的基因表达动态大脑是身体中最受保护的器官，被复杂且几乎无法穿透的特殊血管屏障包裹着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-blood-test-monitors-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-blood-test-monitors-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b64e31-55e0-447a-8cfa-91e7f8aab88e Thu, 11 Jan 2024 14:23:07 -0500 Revolutionary blood test monitors gene expression dynamics in the brain
人工智能考试提高了青少年糖尿病眼部筛查率约翰·霍普金斯儿童中心对患有糖尿病的儿童和青少年进行的一项研究得出的结论是，所谓的自主人工智能 (AI) 糖尿病眼科检查可显着提高旨在预防潜在致盲糖尿病眼病 (DED) 的筛查完成率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/AI-exam-boosts-diabetic-eye-screening-rates-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/AI-exam-boosts-diabetic-eye-screening-rates-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77cfb51e-003c-463a-8edb-b935d46abe22 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 11:25:15 -0500 AI exam boosts diabetic eye screening rates in youth
年轻男性营养状况与骨骼健康之间的联系维生素 D/铁状态和钙摄入量对成年男性腰椎皮质和骨小梁的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/The-link- Between- Nutrition-status-and-bone-health-in-young-males.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/The-link- Between- Nutrition-status-and-bone-health-in-young-males.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b488524-5962-42c0-8ede-6608df6b574c Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:44:00 -0500 The link between nutrient status and bone health in young males
工作场所对身体活动和久坐的干预措施可增强心理健康旨在减少久坐行为的六个月多层次工作场所干预措施的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Enhanced-mental-wellbeing-linked-to-workplace-interventions-on-physical-activity-and-sedentariness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Enhanced-mental-wellbeing-linked-to-workplace-interventions-on-physical-activity-and-sedentariness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=267b3bf5-8059-4882-bee5-800cbdfabb71 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:25:00 -0500 Enhanced mental wellbeing linked to workplace interventions on physical activity and sedentariness
阻断糖分子阻止流感病毒在小鼠体内传播科学家们早就知道，一些病毒和细菌首先会附着在包括人类在内的哺乳动物鼻窦和喉咙内壁细胞表面的糖分子上，从而开始感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Blocking-sugar-molecules-stops-flu-virus-spread-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Blocking-sugar-molecules-stops-flu-virus-spread-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78f5c219-f391-4208-89cc-6f4c581006c3 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:15:54 -0500 Blocking sugar molecules stops flu virus spread in mice
揭示皮肤微生物组对衰老的影响衰老和紫外线等外部因素对皮肤的影响已有充分记录。随着人们年龄的增长或在阳光下呆的时间越来越长，他们的皮肤往往会变得干燥、皱纹增多， https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unraveling-the-skin-microbiomes-impact-on-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unraveling-the-skin-microbiomes-impact-on-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e7b6b7-3130-4c5c-85e3-5d7ade6df17d Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:09:10 -0500 Unraveling the skin microbiome's impact on aging
简化实验室与 INTEGRA 电子和自动化液体处理解决方案的集成生命科学领域的快速技术进步使自动化成为许多实验室的重点关注点，INTEGRA Biosciences 很自豪能够提供先进的液体处理解决方案来简化实验室方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Streamlined-Laboratory-Integration-With-INTEGRAe28099s-Electronic-and-Automated-Liquid-Handling-Solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Streamlined-Laboratory-Integration-With-INTEGRAe28099s-Electronic-and-Automated-Liquid-Handling-Solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fe15874-f2f6-42f2-8b44-485404117bfd Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:02:00 -0500 Streamlined Laboratory Integration With INTEGRA’s Electronic and Automated Liquid Handling Solutions
BNT162b2 疫苗在预防 SARS-CoV-2 感染和严重疾病方面的有效性BNT162b2 疫苗可有效预防严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/BNT162b2-vaccine-efficiency-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-severe-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/BNT162b2-vaccine-effectness-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-severe-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dcd1de9-9871-4f23-9007-f5c1e7e8a919 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 09:53:00 -0500 BNT162b2 vaccine effectiveness in preventing SARS-CoV-2 infection and severe disease
系统基因组分析可生成 COVID-19 浪潮的早期预警信号用于检测严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 的传输适应性多态性 (TFP) 扫描仪分析流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Phylogenomic-analysis-to-generate-early-warning-signs-for-COVID-19-waves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Phylogenomic-analysis-to-generate-early-warning-signs-for-COVID-19-waves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d50c95-37d9-440b-af32-64d838bc9f4d Thu, 11 Jan 2024 09:21:00 -0500 Phylogenomic analysis to generate early warning signs for COVID-19 waves
中风患者的新希望：辛辛那提大学试验测试独特的舌头锻炼装置加德纳神经科学研究所在 NIH 66 万美元拨款的支持下，正在开展一项试验，测试家庭舌头耐力练习，旨在改善中风幸存者的吞咽功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-hope-for-中风-病人-大学辛辛那提-试验-测试-unique-tongue-exercise-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-hope-for-中风-病人-大学辛辛那提-试验-测试-unique-tongue-exercise-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5e39e5c-78dd-41a2-9621-ab96e1e88a5a Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:55:00 -0500 New hope for stroke patients: University of Cincinnati trial tests unique tongue exercise device
